extendedInfo.description: Cool your device down with Cool My Droid!This is one of the first apps that cools your phone on the Android Market. Cool My Droid helps your device get back down to a safe operating temperature, skipping the hassle of having to restart it. Just hit the "off" button to start. Works for tablets too!If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to email the developer.This app does not include a widget due to the fact that this could potentially increase the device's temperature. That would defeat the purpose of the app.Caution: In an attempt to cool your device faster, some antennas on your device will be turned off.Like us on Facebook!https://www.facebook.com/CoolDownPhoneThanks to:http://iconbug.com/detail/icon/346/super-cold/

reviews.title: It works
reviews.comment: It works for me and I noticed the difference in a few minutes. However I had to close my browser - Google chrome - first before I felt the difference. It could improve by having more options and be quicker to cool down.
reviews.author: Erias Xiong

reviews.title: Totally sucks
reviews.comment: Galaxy s3 does nothing and no settings or options
reviews.author: Sergio Garcia

reviews.title: App
reviews.comment: Its a fantastic. Apparently. So glad I bought. It.  It works really. Fast and really. Cools down the phone
reviews.author: bunny rose

reviews.title: Bad.. and no option for refund?
reviews.comment: Installed.. was at 104, turned on cooling and it went UP to 106?! And I couldn\'t get a refund for whatever reason.. what a waste, don\'t bother with this!
reviews.author: Graham Warwick

reviews.title: Awesome app!!!
reviews.comment: Saved my phone from being drop kicked!!! Simple app that does exactly what its supposed to do. Not sure what the neg comment was about...this app rocks! Maybe the user was new to Android?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fake app
reviews.comment: Don\'t waste your money! All it is a temperature gauge! It does absolutely nothing but give you the temperature of your phone what a joke!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Whoa..
reviews.comment: Havent felt my phone this cool in like forever.. But it does need work. Setting does nothing, a widget and other features would be nice.. 4* for the meantime.

reviews.title: Did not work, only showed temp
reviews.comment: It lowered the light on my phone which made it unusable for me and did NOT lower the HOT temp my phone gets too!

reviews.title: Works great, but very basic
reviews.comment: This app works great on my S3.  But it\'s options are extremely minimal.  No widget, no automatic setting.  Even pressing the settings button within the app does nothing.  Worth the money, but needs a lot of improvements, especially for a $2 app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Does exactly what it says. Cooled my droid down in a short amt of time easily.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Ugh this app is crap and an expensive app Wtf I want my money back. Do not purchase!

reviews.title: Lifesaver
reviews.comment: This app made a huge difference with my phone\'s overheating problem.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sgs2
reviews.comment: A good buy. It really works. The higher the temperature, the quicker the cool down. And it informs you when at a safe temperature.

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work just puts your phone in to airplane mode and dims the screen all the way down\tDoesn\'t work just puts your phone in to airplane mode and dims the screen all the way down
